objects.text: • 100+ HOURS PLAYTIME • FOLDABLE DESIGN • SIGNATURE SOUND

product_details.name: Marshall Major V On-Ear Bluetooth Headphone, Black
product_details.description:
- True icons never die; they just get better with time.
- Major V is no different.
- From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined.
- Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek, modern product advertisement with a bold and energetic vibe. Centered is a realistic image of headphones encircled by a golden-stroked dark ring, visually highlighting the product. The headline ("heading") is styled in large, playful bold golden-yellow text, immediately catching attention. Below it, a secondary tagline ("tagline") in clean white sans-serif font reinforces the experience-focused messaging. A contrasting yellow circular badge displays the price ("price") prominently on the right. At the bottom, a horizontal feature list ("description") presents key benefits, followed by a 'SHOP NOW' call-to-action ("cta") in black set over a bold golden button ("cta_background"). The background includes abstract circles, diagonal bands, and dotted elements in muted golds and charcoals for added depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold Yellow: `#D4AF37`
- Deep Black: `#111111`
- Dark Gray: `#222222`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and premium black Marshall headphone with a textured leather finish. The primary color used is matte black (#1C1C1C), which gives the product a bold and modern appeal. Textural variation adds depth, particularly in the ear cups and headband. The metallic gold accent (#D4AF37) on the control knob introduces a luxurious contrast that subtly breaks the monochrome. The brand name in white (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply, enhancing brand visibility. The blending of blacks with different textures enhances the premium feel, while the highlights ensure key design features are distinguishable. Ideal banner palette: #1C1C1C, #2F2F2F, #D4AF37, #FFFFFF.
